T03D3807-2:52b-16: bstan pa ste / pa bya ste / rnam pa

T03D3807-2:52b-20: // ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib ces bya

T03D3807-2:52b-26: yongs su grub pa yin pas sems can mang po

T03D3807-2:52b-28: sor rtogs shing go ba tsam du zad kyi de

T03D3807-2:53a-8: don zab mo mi 'gyur ba yongs su grub cing
T03D3807-2:53a-9: / rkyen gyi khar ma las pa mos pa dang
T03D3807-2:53a-10: yid ches par dka' ba de lta bu la spyod
T03D3807-2:53a-12: sems zhum pa dang g-yeng bar yang mi 'gyur la /
T03D3807-2:53a-13: brtson 'grus mi gtong zhing phyir mi ldog par nus

T03D3807-2:53a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa
T03D3807-2:53a-20: 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste zhes bya ba
T03D3807-2:53a-21: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
T03D3807-2:53a-22: zab mo bsgom zhing nyams su len pa dka' ba
T03D3807-2:53a-23: spyod pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-2:53a-24: ji ltar nam mkha' dngos po med cing mtshan ma
T03D3807-2:53a-25: thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du shes rab
T03D3807-2:53a-26: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo 'di
T03D3807-2:53a-27: yang dngos po med cing mtshan ma med pa la
T03D3807-2:53a-28: spyod cing bsgom yang skyo zhing yid 'byung bar mi
T03D3807-2:53a-29: 'gyur ba dka' ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i don
T03D3807-2:53a-30: to // nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so //

T03D3807-2:53a-33: chub ma mchis so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni
T03D3807-2:53a-34: nam mkha' la dngos po dang /
T03D3807-2:53a-35: mtshan ma med pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
T03D3807-2:53a-36: nam mkha' ni gzugs la sogs pa bla na med
T03D3807-2:53a-37: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la thug
T03D3807-2:53a-38: gi bar du chos de dag thams cad kyi dngos

T03D3807-2:53a-43: spyod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'o //

T03D3807-2:53a-45: po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag
T03D3807-2:53a-46: ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o zhes bya ba ni
T03D3807-2:53b-0: gong du bshad pa'i tshul du @53b shes rab kyi
T03D3807-2:53b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo nam mkha'
T03D3807-2:53b-2: dang 'dra ba la spyod cing bsgom yang sems zhum
T03D3807-2:53b-3: par mi 'gyur zhing phyir ldog par mi 'gyur la
T03D3807-2:53b-4: / dka' ba spyod pa de lta bu dkon zhing ngo mtshar che ste /
T03D3807-2:53b-5: go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas lha dang
T03D3807-2:53b-6: mi rnams kyis mchod cing phyag bya bar 'os pa
T03D3807-2:53b-8: bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba
T03D3807-2:53b-9: de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos
T03D3807-2:53b-10: 'bad par mos rtsol bar mos pa dag ste zhes
T03D3807-2:53b-11: bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3807-2:53b-12: pa'i don zab mo bsgom zhing yid ches par dka'
T03D3807-2:53b-13: ba la bsgom yang sems zhum par mi 'gyur zhing
T03D3807-2:53b-14: phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag
T03D3807-2:53b-15: dka' ba spyod pa'i dpe nam mkha' la rtsol zhing
T03D3807-2:53b-16: 'bad pa dang 'dra bar dka' ba bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-2:53b-17: bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad
T03D3807-2:53b-18: du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'
T03D3807-2:53b-19: yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol bar
T03D3807-2:53b-20: 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su
T03D3807-2:53b-21: smin par bya ba dang rnam par grol bar bya
T03D3807-2:53b-22: ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa de
T03D3807-2:53b-23: dag kyang don dam par sems can dngos po med
T03D3807-2:53b-24: de // ma mkha' dang 'dra ba la yongs su smin pa dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-25: rnam par grol bar byed pa ni nam mkha' yongs su smin pa dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-26: rnam par grol bar bya bar 'dod du zad do zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-2:53b-27: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3807-2:53b-28: po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du
T03D3807-2:53b-29: go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen
T03D3807-2:53b-30: po 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin
T03D3807-2:53b-32: rnam par grol bar bya ba'i sems can rnams dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-33: mngon par rtogs par bya ba dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-34: thob par bya ba'i rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-35: yongs su spang zhing zad par bya ba'i nyon mongs
T03D3807-2:53b-36: pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos thams cad don dam
T03D3807-2:53b-37: par dngos po med cing rang bzhin gyis stong ste
T03D3807-2:53b-38: / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la sems can rnams yongs su smin pa dang /
T03D3807-2:53b-39: rnam par grol bar bya bar brtson pa dang rnam
T03D3807-2:53b-40: par byang ba'i chos rnams mngon par rtogs shing thob
T03D3807-2:53b-41: par bya bar brtson pa dang /
T03D3807-2:54a-1: phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang zhing
T03D3807-2:54a-2: zad par bya bar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3807-2:54a-3: de dag ni dka' ba spyod pa ste /
T03D3807-2:54a-4: go cha chen po bgos pa yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-2:54a-5: bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go
T03D3807-2:54a-6: cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang
T03D3807-2:54a-7: la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba yang don
T03D3807-2:54a-8: dam par sems can dngos po med de /
T03D3807-2:54a-9: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la sems can gyi don
T03D3807-2:54a-10: bya bar rtsol ba de dag kyang dka' ba spyod
T03D3807-2:54a-12: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3807-2:54a-13: po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na
T03D3807-2:54a-14: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T03D3807-2:54a-15: yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus
T03D3807-2:54a-16: chen po thob pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub
T03D3807-2:54a-17: sems dpa' sems can gyi don du bla na med
T03D3807-2:54a-18: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
T03D3807-2:54a-19: byed pa yang don dam par sems can dang bla
T03D3807-2:54a-20: na med pa'i byang chub gnyis ka dngos po med
T03D3807-2:54a-21: de / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la mi skyo
T03D3807-2:54a-22: zhing slar mi ldog par rtsol zhing 'bad pa ni
T03D3807-2:54a-23: go cha chen po bgos pa yin no zhes bstan
T03D3807-2:54a-24: de / pa'o // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
T03D3807-2:54a-25: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi
T03D3807-2:54a-26: don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T03D3807-2:54a-27: pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go

T03D3807-2:252a-12: du bye brag mchis par bshad ces zhus pa'o //
T03D3807-2:252a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3807-2:252a-14: rab 'byor bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni /
T03D3807-2:252a-15: nyon mongs pa ma yin mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T03D3807-2:252a-16: nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par grol
T03D3807-2:252a-17: ba la ni bye brag med kyi bag chags spangs
T03D3807-2:252a-18: ma spangs pa la ni bye brag yod pa bstan
T03D3807-2:252a-19: pa ste / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams /
T03D3807-2:252a-20: bag chags rnam pa thams cad du ma spangs pas /
T03D3807-2:252a-23: gti mug gi bag chags kyi dbang gis lus dang ngag gi spyod pa 'gyur ba yod do //
T03D3807-2:252a-24: dper na 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dag nyon mongs pa spangs kyang /
T03D3807-2:252a-25: kha cig sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis /
T03D3807-2:252a-26: me long la lta ba dang /
T03D3807-2:252a-28: pi lin dha bad sa lta bu gang g'a'i lha
T03D3807-2:252a-29: mo la dmangs mo'i tshig brjod pa lta bu ste
T03D3807-2:252a-30: bag chags de dag las gyur pa'i lus dang ngag
T03D3807-2:252a-31: gi spyod pa de lta bu ni byis pa so
T03D3807-2:252a-32: so'i skye bo thams cad la yod do //
T03D3807-2:252a-33: kun dang thun mong ba 'dras kyang /
T03D3807-2:252a-34: 'phags pa rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas
T03D3807-2:252a-35: bag chags las gyur pa'i lus dang ngag gi spyod
T03D3807-2:252a-36: pa de dag ni su la yang gnod pa med
T03D3807-2:252a-37: pa'i phyir / 'dus ma byas pa la bye brag med do zhes bstan pa'o //
T03D3807-2:252a-38: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T03D3807-2:252a-39: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba
T03D3807-2:252a-40: la sogs pa ni bag chags de lta bu de
T03D3807-2:252a-41: bzhin gshegs pa la ni yang ye mi mnga'o zhes
T03D3807-2:252a-43: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa rgya cher bshad pa /
T03D3807-2:252a-44: dus gsum skyed mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal te //
T03D3807-2:252a-45: bla ma'i lung gis nyid la phan mdzad phyir //
T03D3807-2:252a-46: rlom pa mi mnga' zhal bskyungs mdzad mod kyi //
T03D3807-2:252a-47: skye bo yongs la brtse phyir mdo gzhung bkrol //
T03D3807-2:252a-48: gnas brtan che la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
